properties.entry: SELECT invt.* FROM inventory invt WHERE 1 = 1 --<INVENTORY_ID> and invt.inventory_id in (:INVENTORY_ID) --<PRODUCT_ID> and invt.product_id in (:PRODUCT_ID) --<CATEGORY> and invt.category in (:CATEGORY) --<LOCATION_ID> and invt.location_id in (:LOCATION_ID) --<LOCATION_TYPE> and invt.location_type in (:LOCATION_TYPE) --<SOURCE_INVENTORY> and invt.source_inventory in (:SOURCE_INVENTORY) --<IS_DELETED> and invt.is_deleted = :IS_DELETED
